name: Twin Matrix
description:
If the game doesn't load properly, then click the green flag again (due to a small problem it is.)

Use arrow keys to move. Beware of the green glitch and purple mix.

(ONLY 80% CAN SOLVE THIS!!!)

 did this all by myself without anybody's help. This game was a submission for The Unofficial Scratch Jam by DeeTDM. Here's the link: https://itch.io/jam/the-unofficial-scratch-jam.

Music: The Endless BEAT by Mr.StiK (copyrights reserved.)
